original_title: New Anti-Corruption Bill published via gazette
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lankan Government published its new Anti-Corruption Bill via a gazette.
The Bill was published by order of the Minister of Justice, Prison Affairs, and Constitutional Reforms.
Bill placed in Bangladesh Parliament to ban protests and strikes in essential services
Trincomalee bound train derails in Agbopura; Over a dozen injured
Doctors Without Borders rescues over 400 migrants including Sri Lankans off the coast of Malta
